content: --अंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} solitary, retired. {2} aside, apart. {3} directed towards one point or object only. {4} excessive, great; °शैत्यात्कदलीविशेषाः <ls>Ku. 1. 36.</ls> {5} worshipping only only. {6} absolute, invariable, perpetual; स्वायत्तमेकांतगुणं <ls>Bh. 2. 7</ls>; कस्यैकांतं सुखमुपगतं <ls>Me. 109.</ls> (--तः {1} a lonely or retired place, solitude; व्योम° विहारिणः <ls>Pt. 2. 20</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 52.</ls> {2} exclusiveness. {3} an invariable rule or course of conduct or action; <ls>Pt. 3. 7.</ls> {4} exclusive aim or boundary. (--तं an exclusive recourse, a settled rule or principle; तेजः क्षमा वा नैकांतं कालज्ञस्य महीपतेः <ls>Śi. 2. 83.</ls> (--तं, --तेन, --ततः, --ते {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} solely, exclusively, invariably, always, absolutely. {2} exceeding, quite, wholly, very much; वयमप्येकांततो निःस्पृहाः <ls>Bh. 3. 24</ls>; दुःखमेकांततो वा <ls>Me. 109</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>;
